Text: FW natural gas inquiryHey John Youre the only guy I know in Nat Gas Please forward this to the right person Thanks Lenny Original Message From Brown Ron X Sent Tuesday November AM To Hochschild Lenny Subject natural gas inquiry Hi Lenny Dont know if you are involved in this area or not I think maybe Anyway we have a refined lead contract with Hammond The local buyer for Pottstown PA is interested in getting information about natural gas for possible future use from ENRON If you could contact him or direct him to the person that is in a position to help it would be appreciated His name is Joe Stewartz EMAIL address is telephone number Fax number Thanking you in advance and hope all is well with you Regards Ron Brown

RE RasheedGoldstein Original Message From Arnold John Sent Saturday October AM To Hochschild Lenny Subject RE Rasheed that kid is hilarious Do you know what his last name is Original Message From Hochschild Lenny Sent Friday October AM To Arnold John Subject Rasheed Im gonna GETCHA
People FinderThis has been turned off for whatever reason Pls get it turned back on We cannot function with other departments if we dont have their extensions

RE KU Compliance Deal Not yet Were making progress on agreeing the contractual language three issues left which I think well get through awaiting their response The main problem is that they are insisting that we sign the deal with their unregulated arm LGE Fuel Services Inc as opposed to KU Their explanation is that bc LGE Fuel Services Inc is unregulated they wouldnt be the subject of a Public Service Commission Review in the event Enron doesnt perform Tom Moran is in contact with KU to see what umbrella if any LGE Fuel Services Inc is lying under Will keep you updated Lenny Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tuesday November AM To Hochschild Lenny Subject RE KU Compliance Deal did you get this done Original Message From Hochschild Lenny Sent Friday November AM To Moran Tom Gresham Wayne Cc Shankman Jeffrey A Mcquade Tom Subject KU Compliance Deal Were trying to close an in the money sale with KU They called Tom Mcquade yesterday evening to say that they cant deal with us bc of credit Their commercial guy suggested that if we want to get this deal done quickly we should go through their unregulated group LGE Fuel Services Incorporated and we need to keep the original contractual language as they initially proposed We need to get this deal closed quickly consequently We either need to get KUs credit guys comfortable with our credit or do this deal with LGE Fuel Services Incorporated Tom do you feel comfortable with LGEs Fuel Services Inc credit The sale is tpy for years at t in a roughly t market and dropping Wayne please call their attorney Beth Cocaneougher Shes the one who told their commercial guy they cant deal with us bc of credit Apparently she wants to have us revert back to the original contractual language sounds like a retrade and do this deal with LGE Please call her to see what language she needs changed beyond what we have already agreed to and see if we can get our credit guys to discuss any concerns that they might have with whoever is a decision maker over there Thanks Lenny

KU Compliance Deal Cc Were trying to close an in the money sale with KU They called Tom Mcquade yesterday evening to say that they cant deal with us bc of credit Their commercial guy suggested that if we want to get this deal done quickly we should go through their unregulated group LGE Fuel Services Incorporated and we need to keep the original contractual language as they initially proposed We need to get this deal closed quickly consequently We either need to get KUs credit guys comfortable with our credit or do this deal with LGE Fuel Services Incorporated Tom do you feel comfortable with LGEs Fuel Services Inc credit The sale is tpy for years at t in a roughly t market and dropping Wayne please call their attorney Beth Cocaneougher Shes the one who told their commercial guy they cant deal with us bc of credit Apparently she wants to have us revert back to the original contractual language sounds like a retrade and do this deal with LGE Please call her to see what language she needs changed beyond what we have already agreed to and see if we can get our credit guys to discuss any concerns that they might have with whoever is a decision maker over there Thanks Lenny

RE EntouchOriginal Message From Taylor Michael E Sent Wednesday August AM To Wharton Marc Hochschild Lenny Subject Entouch What do you think Any changes I need to send this out this morning Coal and Emissions Trading The first Enron Online synfuel trade occurred this past week establishing EOL as the only online marketplace for synfuel The purpose of bringing synfuel on EOL is to provide market transparency between the coalsynfuel spread The coal cash book which began trading only two months ago has traded over million spot tons The fundamental purpose of this book is to capture short term market discrepancies while also adding liquidity to the spot market to further long term trading and marketing while reducing execution risk Mike
